tool_description: Calculates optimized packaging dimensions based on item specifications and packaging materials, considering dimensional weight implications.

item_lengths.description: Length of each item in inches

item_widths.description: Width of each item in inches

item_heights.description: Height of each item in inches

packaging_type.description: Type of packaging (box, envelope, tube, irregular)

fragile_items.description: Whether items require extra protective packaging

consolidate_packages.description: Whether to attempt consolidating items into fewer packages

error_messages: Invalid dimensions: All item dimensions must be positive numbers greater than 0
Dimension array mismatch: item_lengths, item_widths, and item_heights must have the same number of elements
Unsupported packaging type: Use one of [box, envelope, tube, irregular]
Padding value error: padding_inches must be a positive number between 0 and 12
usage: Provide arrays of item dimensions, specify packaging_type, and optionally set padding_inches, fragile_items, and consolidate_packages to calculate optimal package dimensions.
